title: The Beach Boys Albums (2001 HDCD Remasters) (VBR MP3 + Covers)
description:
This torrent contains Lame VBR MP3 files encoded from lossless source. They were claimed to be made from the 2001 HDCD Remasters (which is supposed to sound a lot better than earlier CD versions) and I could hear a positive difference on the albums where I had an older version on the computer (Pet Sounds and Surfin&#039; Safari /Surfin&#039; USA) and all the other albums sounds great too, so I think it is genuine.

The torrent contains the Beach Boys&#039; sixties albums, which is the only ones that were remastered in 2001, namely:

Beach Boys&#039; Party! / Stack-O-Tracks
Concert / Live In London
Friends / 20/20
Little Deuce Coupe / All Summer Long
Pet Sounds (Mono and Stereo Versions)
Smiley Smile / Wild Honey 
Surfer Girl / Shut Down, Vol. 2
Surfin&#039; Safari /Surfin&#039; USA
Today! / Summer Days (And Summer Nights!!)

All files encoded with Lame 3.97 VBR with the settings -V2 --vbr-new, which gives a lame header like:

Quality                       : 77
Version String                : Lame 3.97
Tag Revision                  : 0
VBR Method                    : vbr-mtrh
Lowpass Filter                : 18600
Psycho-acoustic Model         : nspsytune
Safe Joint Stereo             : yes
nogap (continued)             : no
nogap (continuation)          : no
ATH Type                      : 4
ABR Bitrate                   : 32
Noise Shaping                 : 1
Stereo Mode                   : Joint Stereo
Unwise Settings Used          : no
Input Frequency               : 44.1kHz

--[ EncSpot Console 2.0 ]--[ http://www.guerillasoft.com ]--

Enjoy the good, old time songs, remember to seed at least to 1.0 ratio and feel free to rate the torrent / give a comment.
